name: Converging Lanes
description:
I made this for GMC Jam #6.

The theme was CONVERGENCE.

It placed 8th overall and won for "best use of theme".

Controls
========
Left-click to speed  cars up.
Right-click to slow cars down.
Avoid crashing!

Credits
========
"night adventure" by Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov
Engine Rev sound effect by dklon, https://opengameart.org/users/dklon
Breaking sound effect by audible-edge, https://freesound.org/people/audible-edge/
Crash sound effect by Cam Martinez, via http://soundbible.com

HTML5 note: sound appears to be laggy in the HTML5 version, it wasn't the intended build but I'll try to fix it at some point.
